metadata.name: Vidhin's Regexes - Basic
metadata.description:
Essential sorting for Anime, Movies, and TV Shows using regex patterns from [TRaSH Guides](https://trash-guides.info). Features 30 Ranked Stream Expressions focused on release groups with intelligent scoring. 

 * **Includes 30 regex-based expressions for release group ranking** 
 * Works within default limits - perfect for public instances 
 * **â“˜ Requires Stream Expression Score in your sort order** (remove Regex Patterns) 
 * Add `{stream.streamExpressionScore}` to formatter to display scores 
 * Fixes case-sensitive regex issues and anime/normal grouping problems 
 * **Recommended for public instances or users preferring release group-only scoring**
metadata.author: Vidhin05

rankedStreamExpressions.expression: /*Remux Tier 01*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Remux T1') : []
/*Remux Tier 02*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Remux T2') : []
/*Remux Tier 03*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Remux T3') : []
/*HD Bluray Tier 01*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Bluray T1') : []
/*HD Bluray Tier 02*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Bluray T2') : []
/*HD Bluray Tier 03*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Bluray T3') : []
/*WEB Tier 01*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Web T1') : []
/*WEB Tier 02*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Web T2') : []
/*WEB Tier 03*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Web T3') : []
/*Web Scene*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Web Scene') : []
/*SeaDex Best*/ isAnime ? seadex(streams, 'best') : []
/*SeaDex Alt*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams, 'best'), seadex(streams)) : []
/*Anime BD Tier 01*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T1') : []
/*Anime BD Tier 02*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T2') : []
/*Anime BD Tier 03*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T3') : []
/*Anime BD Tier 04*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T4') : []
/*Anime BD Tier 05*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T5') : []
/*Anime BD Tier 06*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T6') : []
/*Anime BD Tier 07*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T7') : []
/*Anime BD Tier 08*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T8') : []
/*Anime Web Tier 01*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime Web T1') : []
/*Anime Web Tier 02*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime Web T2') : []
/*Anime Web Tier 03*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime Web T3') : []
/*Anime Web Tier 04*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime Web T4') : []
/*Anime Web Tier 05*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime Web T5') : []
/*Anime Web Tier 06*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Anime Web T6') : []
/*Remux Tier 01 (Anime)*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Remux T1') : []
/*Remux Tier 02 (Anime)*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Remux T2') : []
/*Remux Tier 03 (Anime)*/ isAnime ? regexMatched(streams,'Remux T3') : []
/*Bad (3D / Anime LQ Groups / Anime Raws / AV1 / Bad Dual Groups / Dubs Only / Extras / VOSTFR / Generated Dynamic HDR / LQ / LQ (Release Title) / Sing-Along Versions)*/ regexMatched(streams, 'Bad')
